DOC.brief_summary: To compare pharmacodynamics among different concentration BCS NS .
DOC.brief_title: A Pharmacodynamic Safety Study BCS Healthy Volunteers
DOC.detailed_description: 2 time mouthwash morning night . To collect bacterium sample ass pharmacodynamics among different concentration BCS NS : observe change aerobic bacterial colonization oropharyngeal time 24 hour , assess improvement oral healthy status subjective feeling 24 hour .
DOC.criteria: Healthy volunteer , male female . Females UHCG negative . Signed ICFs , could conduct study investigator . History mouthwash allergy , allergic rhinitis dermatitis . Volunteers oral ulcer , severe periodontal disease , oral mucosal lesion oral cancer . Volunteers removable denture . Had receive special oral clean .
